page.title: 11A Day in the Life...a Child
page.content: Before playtime we did our Maths,and after play we did our English.Then it was time for dinner.I had a school dinner,and today I had chips,sausage, and beans.For pudding it was jam sponge and custard.When I had finished my dinner,I played football with my friends. In the afternoon we practised for the Summer Carnival.After last play we did games with Mr Richards' class.We could either do cricket with Mr Woodward or rounders with Mr Richards.I decided to play cricket with Mr Woodward. At quarter to four school finished so I went home.I played out with my friends until it was my teatime,and I played out again after my tea.When I came in I had a shower,put my pyjamas on,and went to bed at nine o'clock. Andrew Dobson
